#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define trace(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << " ";
#define tracen(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << "\n";

typedef long long lolo;
typedef unsigned long long ulolo;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
#define fi first
#define se second

const int INF = 1e9 + 23;
const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
const int MAXN = 1e6 + 100;

int isprime[MAXN];
int arr[MAXN];

void pre() {
  fill(isprime, isprime + MAXN, true);
  for (int i = 2; i < MAXN; ++i) {
    arr[i] = arr[i - 1] + isprime[i];
    if (isprime[i]) {
      for (int j = i + i; j < MAXN; j += i) isprime[j] = false;
    }
  }
}

int main()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  pre();
  int t, a, b;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> a >> b;
    cout << arr[b] - arr[a - 1] << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

// g++ -W -Wkk -Wextra -pedantic -std=c++11 -o p main.cpp
